project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of the project is to improve power supply and operating efficiency in the Maharashtra State Electricity Board (MESB) and in the Western Region power system. The project comprises the following components: (i) construction of a 1000 MW fourth-stage of the Koyna hydroelectric power plant; (ii) inspection and repairs -as needed- to the existing Koyna dam; (iii) supply and erection of equipment and material for MESB's five year transmission and distribution investment program, and strengthening of MESB's capabilities for planning of distribution systems; (iv) implementation of plans to strengthen MESB's finances, management, and operations; and (v) consultancy and training services, as well as computer hardware and software required to implement the project.
